title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Quick and healthy stir-fried vegetables with a savory sauce, perfect for weeknight dinners.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic homemade cookies with melty chocolate chips and a soft center.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Simple yet delicious toast topped with mashed avocado, salt, and pepper.

title: Beef Burger
summary: Juicy beef patty with cheese, lettuce, and special sauce on a toasted bun.
